page.title: 07Watersports
page.content: One of the sailing clubs is St.Mawes, and offers temporary membership to visiting yachtsmen and their families. They have at present a fairly small clubhouse,but are about to have a large one erected.The other club is at Percuil and this offers a similar membershipto visitors,with races regularly throughout the season and tuition to beginners. Although windsurfing is carried out at St.Mawes,it is far more popular in the waters around Portscatho,as the coast here is more open and therefore winds are stronger,giving windsurfers conditions which are better suited to their sport.At Portscatho there is also a windsurfing school operating from Portcurnick Beach where tuition is given or boards may be hired.
